head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LOGOTHETIDES, CONSTANTINE J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LOGOTHETIDES, CONSTANTINE J.

block.p: LOGOTHETIDES-Constantine J. On July 26, 2000. Beloved husband of Nellie. Dear brother-in-law of Constantinos and Kathy Salamis, and James and Jean Schoolarinos. Loving uncle. Funeral service at Holy Trinity Greek Orthodox Cathedral, 319 E. 74 St, NYC Saturday, 11AM. Friends and relatives may visit Saturday, 10-11AM at the Cathedral. In lieu of flowers, donations to Saint Michael's Greek Old Age Home, 3 Lehman Terrace, Yonkers, New York 10705 preferred. For further information, contact Apostle Funeral Home, 212-942-4000.
